title: Message
description: JSON schema for a user message

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the message.

threadId.description: The unique identifier of the thread this message belongs to.

createdBy.description: The unique identifier of the sender of this message.

recipientType.description: For messages sent to other users, recipientType=PRINCIPAL.  For comments on Synapse objects (projects, files, etc.) recipientType=ENTITY
recipientType.name: RecipientType

recipients.description: The unique identifiers of the intended recipients of this message

createdOn.description: The timestamp when this message was sent.

messageFileHandleId.description: The S3 file handle storing the content of this message.
